version_description:
Improved router logging in
Fix auto update

If running into any issue, please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com so we can help.

1. Adds Turbo Transfer function, allow user to easily transfer files between iOS Genie device and Windows/Android Genie devices.
2. Fixes the issue that Parental

1. Fixes Genie auto-quit issue in iOS 7 and earlier version.
2. A few routers (WNDR3400v2, R6300v1, R6200v1, R6200v2, WNDR4000, WNDR3700v3, WNDR4500) have recently released a new firmware that fixes the Genie login issue. Please update your router fir

Contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.
Change in 2.1.00:
1. Need Location Service access to allow user to rate routers in different regions.
2. Support dual-band 5GHz Wireless Settings and Guest Network (note that this requires the rout

. Fixed the hang issue when selecting local photos in ReadySHARE page
. Added more router icons in Network Map

Please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.

Change in 2.1.40:
1. Supports Remote Access on R7000 (firmware update required).
2. Other bug fixes

Please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.

Change in 2.4.12:
1. Enable device level filtering in Parental Controls.
2. Other bug fixes

Please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.

Change in 2.4.18:
1. Adds support for the R8500.
2. Fixes the login issue for some router models.

Please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.

Change in 2.4.22:
1. Adds support for the iOS9.
2. Fixes the login issue for user who has customized password.

Please contact netgeargenie@netgear.com for issues.

Change in 2.4.22:
1. Fix bugs.

Change in 2.4.30:
1. Support Orbi router.
2. Fixed D6220 icon.
3. Fixed R7800 icon in the network map.
4. Fixed router IP issue in the network map when remotely logged in through genie app.
5. Fixed copyright information.
6. Fixed enabl

1. Fixes the login failure issue in iOS 10.
2. Fixes the remote login issue in iOS 10.
3. Fixes the network map display issue.
